text: Sam Schachter (born May 8, 1990)COC ProfileFIVB Profile is a Canadian Olympic beach volleyball player. Schachter was born in North York, Ontario and now lives in Richmond Hill, Ontario. His parents Jon and Doris Schachter, and he has an older brother Nathan. He attended Westmount Collegiate Institute for high school.Volleyball Canada He earned his Bachelor of Arts in Communications Studies at Wilfrid Laurier University. In 2014 he and his then partner Josh Binstock were Canadian national champions and also won a gold medal at the Parana Open, an FIVB (international volleyball federation) World Tour event. In 2015 they competed at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto, and finished 8th. Schachter competed along with Binstock at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian men's beach volleyball players Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Beach volleyball players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic beach volleyball players of Canada Category:Beach volleyball players at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Richmond Hill, Ontario Category:University of Toronto alumni Category:Jewish Canadian sportspeople Category:Beach volleyball players at the 2018 Commonwealth Games
title: Sam Schachter
